title: (x) Maryland SPCA's "March for The Animals" - hand lettered by Jessica Hische {Sarah Abrahams}
content:
Hi folks,

Could you help me identify the fonts on this image?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spca_4595.gif)

Many thanks!
author: michme

comments.content: I think the text running around the circle is [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132625/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?itemID=200097).

This was designed by the very talented Jessica Hische: [http://jessicahische.com/illustrategizes/for-the-benefit-of-kittens-and-doggies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132625/http:/jessicahische.com/illustrategizes/for-the-benefit-of-kittens-and-doggies)

In the description of the project, Hische mentions that it required "a ton of hand-lettering," so it may be tricky to find matches. You could always email the designer and ask her directly.

Ever since I saw her [chest hair](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132625/http:/www.swiss-miss.com/2009/11/typographic-chest-hair.html) I must say I am slightly smitten with Jessica (as a designer; nothing romantic tho ;^).
